Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Paulina and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Paulina and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near Stony Island/71st
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near near Stony Island/71st, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near near Stony Island/71st, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 67th, Jeffery, 73rd and Stony Island, over normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and 67th, over normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
